channel.title: React Native on Ehlxr - A responsive and simple theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in React Native on Ehlxr - A responsive and simple theme for Hugo

item.title: 网络请求接口-fetch
item.description: fetch 简介 最简单的 fetch 请求如下 fetch('http://example.com/movies.json') .then(function(resp) { return resp.json(); }) .then(function(data) { console.log(data); }); fetch 请求 封装 1 GET 请求 getData (url) { return fetch(url) } 2 POST 请求 以 form-data 形式提交数据 postData (url, payload) { return fetch(url, { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify(payload), headers: new Headers({ 'Content-Type': 'application/x-www-form-urlencoded' }) }) } 以 json
